org.cip4.elk.alces.util
Class JDFFileFilter

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      org.cip4.elk.alces.util.JDFFileFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FileFilter
public class JDFFileFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
implements java.io.FileFilter

A filter that only accepts JDF job ticket files and directories that whose filenames do not start with '.'.

Author:
Claes Buckwalter (clabu@itn.liu.se)
